price: እነርሱም ዘንድ ተውራት እያለች በውስጧ የአላህ ፍርድ ያለባት ስትኾን እንዴት ያስፈርዱሃል! ከዚያም ከዚህ በኋላ እንዴት ይሸሻሉ! እነዚያም በፍጹም ምእምናን አይደሉም፡፡
arabic: وَكَيۡفَ يُحَكِّمُونَكَ وَعِندَهُمُ ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةُ فِيهَا حُكۡمُ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ يَتَوَلَّوۡنَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَۚ وَمَآ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakayfa yuḥakkimūnaka waʿindahumu al-tawrātu fīhā ḥuk'mu al-lahi thumma yatawallawna min baʿdi dhālika wamā ulāika bil-mu'minīna
